Netizen Tuding Penyiraman Air Keras Novel Baswedan Rekayasa
05 Nov 2019, 04:24 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo memperpanjang waktu pengungkapan kasus penyiraman air keras terhadap penyidik Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi Novel Baswedan. Kepada Kepala Kepolisian Republik Indonesia yang baru dilantik, Jenderal Idham Azis, Jokowi memberi waktu hingga awal Desember.
"Tadi saya sudah sampaikan kepada Kapolri yang baru, saya beri waktu sampai awal Desember," kata Jokowi kepada para wartawan di Istana Merdeka, Jakarta, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Novel Baswedan disiram air keras oleh dua orang tak dikenal pada 11 April 2017, seusai salat subuh di masjid dekat rumahnya di kawasan Kelapa Gading, Jakarta Utara. Serangan itu mengenai kedua matanya, menyebabkan kerusakan parah di mata kiri Novel.
Hingga 2,5 tahun, kasus itu belum juga terungkap. Sejumlah pegiat antikorupsi pun menilai polisi dan pemerintah seperti tak serius mengungkap pelaku dan aktor intelektual penyerangan terhadap penyidik yang kerap menangani kasus korupsi kakap tersebut.
Sejumlah pemilik akun media sosial di Twitter malah menuding adanya rekayasa dalam penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel. Akun-akun itu mencuit dengan narasi soal adanya skenario rekayasa di kasus Novel Baswedan.
"Mungkin dulu Novel Baswedan cuma kena tetes air keras, bukan disiram air keras macam vokalisnya saint loco yang mukanya melepuh semua," tulis pemilik akun @Agung***.
Tempo memperoleh salinan medical record Novel yang menyatakan bahwa Novel mengalami luka parah di dua matanya. Medical record itu berasal dari Eye and Retina Surgeon Singapore. Catatan tersebut menjelaskan bahwa Novel menjalani serangkaian perawatan karena kerusakan di kedua matanya.

Netizens Tuding Baswedan Engineering Hard Watering Novels
05 Nov 2019, 04:24 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - President Joko Widodo extended the time to disclose hard water sprinkling cases against investigators at the Baswedan Corruption Eradication Commission. To the newly appointed head of the Indonesian National Police, General Idham Azis, Jokowi gave time until early December.
"I have already conveyed it to the new National Police Chief, I will give until the beginning of December," Jokowi told reporters at the Merdeka Palace, Jakarta, Friday, November 1, 2019.
The Baswedan novel was doused with hard water by two unidentified people on April 11, 2017, after the dawn prayer at the mosque near his home in Kelapa Gading, North Jakarta. The attack hit his eyes, causing severe damage to Novel's left eye.
Up to 2.5 years, the case has not been revealed. A number of anti-corruption activists also considered the police and the government as not being serious in uncovering the perpetrators and intellectual actors who attacked the investigators who often handled the high profile corruption case.
A number of social media account owners on Twitter even accuse the existence of engineering in splashing hard water on the Novel. The accounts tweeted with narration about the existence of an engineering scenario in the Baswedan Novel case.
"Maybe Baswedan's novel was only hit by a drop of hard water, not doused with hard water like the saint loco vocalist whose face was blistered all," wrote the account holder @Agung ***.
Tempo obtained a copy of Novel's medical record which stated that the Novel suffered severe wounds in his two eyes. The medical record comes from Eye and Retina Surgeon Singapore. The note explains that Novel underwent a series of treatments due to damage in both eyes.
